docs.lead_paragraph: Teletovic, a forward, is in a Los Angeles hospital with blood clots in his lungs and will miss the rest of the season, the Nets said Friday.
docs.abstract: Brooklyn Nets forward Mirza Teletovic will miss rest of season because of blood clots in his lungs.

headline.main: Nets’ Mirza Teletovic Is Sidelined for Season by Blood Clots

docs.snippet: A dig at an ancient tomb in Greece and a possible link to Alexander the Great have captured the nation’s imagination....
docs.lead_paragraph: A dig at an ancient tomb in Greece and a possible link to Alexander the Great have captured the nation’s imagination.
docs.abstract: Ancient tomb discovered in northern Greece is subject of national pride, but some archaeologists fear publicity surrounding dig, as well as Greek reality show about it, is hampering serious scholarship; bones of five people have been found in tomb and some speculate that one of them may be Alexander the Great.

headline.seo: Alexander the Great’s Legacy Stirred Up by Excavation

byline.contributor: Menelaos Tzafalias contributed reporting from Athens.
